text: Amaro Silva (c. 1957 â€“ March 27, 2015) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. He served on the Winnipeg City Council from 1992 to 1998. Silva died on March 27, 2015 following a "serious illness", aged 57. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Winnipeg
title: Amaro Silva
